          , bc = {
            name: "AdminOrgCommittee",
            components: {
                Pagination: vt
            },
            data: function() {
                return {
                    queryInfo: {
                        page: 1,
                        size: 10,
                        org_committee_id: "",
                        title: "",
                        connect_user: ""
                    },
                    formInfo: {
                        id: 0,
                        org_committee_id: "",
                        title: "",
                        duty: "",
                        connect_user: "",
                        connect_duty: "",
                        connect_org: "",
                        connect_phone: ""
                    },
                    domainData: [],
                    tableData: [],
                    tableDataCount: 0,
                    showWindow: !1
                }
            },
            computed: {
                classShowInfoWindow: function() {
                    return this.showWindow ? {
                        visibility: "visible"
                    } : {}
                },
                pageInfo: function() {
                    return {
                        page: this.queryInfo.page,
                        all: Math.ceil(this.tableDataCount / this.queryInfo.size),
                        totalData: this.tableDataCount
                    }
                }
            },
            methods: {
                search: function() {
                    var t = this;
                    return Object(d["a"])(regeneratorRuntime.mark((function e() {
                        return regeneratorRuntime.wrap((function(e) {
                            while (1)
                                switch (e.prev = e.next) {
                                case 0:
                                    return e.next = 2,
                                    t.$http.get("/org_workgroup/", {
                                        params: t.queryInfo
                                    }).then((function(e) {
                                        e.results.forEach((function(e, a) {
                                            e.index = (t.queryInfo.page - 1) * t.queryInfo.size + a + 1
                                        }
                                        )),
                                        t.tableData = e.results,
                                        t.tableDataCount = e.count
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$layer.msg("获取信息失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 2:
                                case "end":
                                    return e.stop()
                                }
                        }
                        ), e)
                    }
                    )))()
                },
                searchField: function() {
                    var t = this;
                    return Object(d["a"])(regeneratorRuntime.mark((function e() {
                        return regeneratorRuntime.wrap((function(e) {
                            while (1)
                                switch (e.prev = e.next) {
                                case 0:
                                    return e.next = 2,
                                    t.$http.get("/org_committee/", {
                                        params: {
                                            page: 1,
                                            size: 1e3
                                        }
                                    }).then((function(e) {
                                        console.log(e),
                                        t.domainData = e.results
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$layer.msg("获取信息失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 2:
                                case "end":
                                    return e.stop()
                                }
                        }
                        ), e)
                    }
                    )))()
                },
                showInfoWindow: function() {
                    this.showWindow = !0
                },
                hideInfoWindow: function() {
                    this.showWindow = !1,
                    this.formInfo = {
                        id: 0,
                        org_committee_id: "",
                        title: "",
                        duty: "",
                        connect_user: "",
                        connect_duty: "",
                        connect_org: "",
                        connect_phone: ""
                    }
                },
                saveInfo: function() {
                    var t = this;
                    return Object(d["a"])(regeneratorRuntime.mark((function e() {
                        return regeneratorRuntime.wrap((function(e) {
                            while (1)
                                switch (e.prev = e.next) {
                                case 0:
                                    if (t.formInfo.org_committee_id) {
                                        e.next = 3;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请选择所属专业领域工作委员会!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 3:
                                    if (t.formInfo.title) {
                                        e.next = 6;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入专委会名称!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 6:
                                    if (t.formInfo.duty) {
                                        e.next = 9;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入专委会职务!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 9:
                                    if (t.formInfo.connect_user) {
                                        e.next = 12;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入姓名!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 12:
                                    if (t.formInfo.connect_duty) {
                                        e.next = 15;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入职务/职称!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 15:
                                    if (t.formInfo.connect_org) {
                                        e.next = 18;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入工作单位!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 18:
                                    if (t.formInfo.connect_phone) {
                                        e.next = 21;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入联系方式!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 21:
                                    if (!t.formInfo.id) {
                                        e.next = 26;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return e.next = 24,
                                    t.$http.put("/org_workgroup/" + t.formInfo.id + "/", t.formInfo).then((function(e) {
                                        e.id ? (t.$layer.msg("修改成功！"),
                                        t.hideInfoWindow(),
                                        t.search()) : t.$layer.msg("修改失败！")
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$layer.msg("修改失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 24:
                                    e.next = 28;
                                    break;
                                case 26:
                                    return e.next = 28,
                                    t.$http.post("/org_workgroup/", t.formInfo).then((function(e) {
                                        e.id ? (t.$layer.msg("添加成功！"),
                                        t.hideInfoWindow(),
                                        t.search()) : t.$layer.msg("添加失败！")
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$layer.msg("添加失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 28:
                                case "end":
                                    return e.stop()
                                }
                        }
                        ), e)
                    }
                    )))()
                },

                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 9:
                                    if (t.formInfo.org_name) {
                                        e.next = 12;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return t.$parent.$parent.$parent.showMsg("请输入工作单位!"),
                                    e.abrupt("return", !1);
                                case 12:
                                    if (!t.formInfo.id) {
                                        e.next = 17;
                                        break
                                    }
                                    return e.next = 15,
                                    t.$http.put("/company_brief/" + t.formInfo.id + "/", t.formInfo).then((function(e) {
                                        e.id ? (t.$layer.msg("修改成功！"),
                                        t.hideInfoWindow(),
                                        t.search()) : t.$layer.msg("修改失败！")
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$layer.msg("修改失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 15:
                                    e.next = 19;
                                    break;
                                case 17:
                                    return e.next = 19,
                                    t.$http.post("/company_brief/", t.formInfo).then((function(e) {
                                        e.id ? (t.$layer.msg("添加成功！"),
                                        t.hideInfoWindow(),
                                        t.search()) : t.$layer.msg("添加失败！")
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$layer.msg("添加失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 19:
                                case "end":
                                    return e.stop()
                                }
                        }
                        ), e)
                    }
                    )))()
                },
                delInfo: function(t) {
                    var e = this;
                    return Object(d["a"])(regeneratorRuntime.mark((function a() {
                        var n;
                        return regeneratorRuntime.wrap((function(a) {
                            while (1)
                                switch (a.prev = a.next) {
                                case 0:
                                    return n = "/company_brief/" + t + "/",
                                    a.next = 3,
                                    e.$http.delete(n).then((function() {
                                        e.$layer.msg("删除成功！"),
                                        e.search()
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        e.$layer.msg("删除失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 3:
                                case "end":
                                    return a.stop()
                                }
                        }
                        ), a)
                    }
                    )))()
                },
                askDel: function(t) {
                    var e = this;
                    this.$parent.$parent.$parent.showConfirm("确定要删除吗？", (function() {
                        e.delInfo(t)
                    }
                    ))
                },

                                    a.next = 3,

                                case 3:
                                case "end":

                                }
                        }
                        ), a)

                    )))()
                },

                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 3:

                                }
                        }
                        ), a)

                    )))()

                this.search()

                        page: 1,

                    },

                    tableDataCount: 0
                }
            },
            computed: {
                pageInfo: function() {
                    return {
                        page: this.queryInfo.page,
                        all: Math.ceil(this.tableDataCount / this.queryInfo.size),
                        totalData: this.tableDataCount
                    }
                }
            },
            methods: {
                changeTab: function(t) {
                    this.changeIndex = t
                },
                search: function() {
                    var t = this;
                    return Object(d["a"])(regeneratorRuntime.mark((function e() {
                        return regeneratorRuntime.wrap((function(e) {
                            while (1)
                                switch (e.prev = e.next) {
                                case 0:
                                    return e.next = 2,
                                    t.$http.get("/application/", {
                                        params: t.queryInfo
                                    }).then((function(e) {
                                        console.log(e),
                                        t.tableData = e.results,
                                        t.tableDataCount = e.count
                                    }
                                    )).catch((function() {
                                        t.$parent.$parent.showMsg("获取通知信息失败！")
                                    }
                                    ));
                                case 2:
                                case "end":
                                    return e.stop()
                                }
                        }
                        ), e)
                    }
                    )))()
                },

                                }

                    )))()

                this.search()
